atk_abil: Normal Attack: Effectively attack multiple enemies at the same time.
Skill Attack: Launch massive circular sword energy to attack and move close to enemy crystal.
Special Ability 1: When first appearing, it uses the buff that increases its movement speed and attack speed, and increases the basic game speed by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Increases orc unit movement speed by 3% and attack speed by 4%.
Special Ability 3: Not affected by terrain attacks above Stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: Moves quickly (dash) toward the first attack target.
Special Ability 5: Immune to paralyze and reduced impact from freeze and knock-back.
Limit Break of Spirit Rest: Increases Spirit Rest efficiency by 0.3%. (Also applied even if unit is in Time Shop and can be increased by up to 10%.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Effectively attack multiple enemies simultaneously.
Skill Attack: Launch massive circular sword energy to attack and move close to enemy crystal.
Special Ability 1: When first appearing, it uses the buff that increases its movement speed and attack speed, and increases the basic game speed by 8%.
Special Ability 2: Increases orc unit movement speed by 6% and attack speed by 7%.
Special Ability 3: Not affected by terrain attacks above Stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: Moves quickly (dash) toward the first attack target.
Special Ability 5: Immune to paralyze and reduced impact from freeze and knock-back.
Limit Break of Spirit Rest: Increases Spirit Rest efficiency by 0.7%. (Also applied even if unit is in Time Shop and can be increased by up to 10%.)

buffs.description: Increases Spirit Rest efficiency even if Blade Master is in the Time Shop (5-star 0.3%, 6-star 0.7%, Max 10%).
buffs.name: Limit Break of Spirit Rest
